speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report by Mrs Frassoni, on behalf of the Committee on Legal Affairs, on the Commission’s 23rd Annual report on monitoring the application of Community law (2005) ( 2006/2271(INI) ) ( A6-0462/2007 ).
original: President. − The next item is the report by Mrs Frassoni, on behalf of the Committee on Legal Affairs, on the Commission’s 23rd Annual report on monitoring the application of Community law (2005) ( 2006/2271(INI) ) ( A6-0462/2007 ).
agenda_item: Monitoring the application of Community law (debate)
